rules_text:
When you cast this spell, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn. 
Spells cast from exile have rebound, and rebound as though they were cast from their owners hand. [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
